title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings
description: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be "Hyperlink Options", but currently it changes based on settings.
OB: When I click on "OK" and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the title of the builder becomes "www.actuate.com" instead of "Hyperlink Options".
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be "Hyperlink Options" regardless of the settings.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Click on "OK" in the hyperlink builder. 2. Reopen the hyperlink builder. The title should change to "www.actuate.com" instead of "Hyperlink Options".
